title: Un Punto Macrobiotico
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Macrobiotic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mostly vegan, occasionally fish. The "piatto misto" (mixed plate) includes a soup and a plate with cereals, legume, rough vegetable and cooked vegetables and costs around 8 euro. Specialties may include as fried vegetables and quiche, plus there is dessert. The bancha is included.
